name: URL Encoder
description: URL encoder converts special URL characters in strings to safe percent-sign characters.
author: leplay

name: URL Decoder
description: URL decoder converts percent-sign special characters in safe URL strings to regular strings.
author: leplay

name: Base64 Encoder
description: Base64 encoder converts texts to base64-encoded strings.
author: leplay

name: Base64 Decoder
description: Base64 decoder converts base64-encoded strings back to regular texts.
author: leplay

name: MD5 Generator
description: MD5 calculator generates MD5 checksum of text or string.
author: leplay

name: SHA-256 Generator
description: SHA-256 calculator generates SHA-256 checksum of text or string.
author: leplay

name: SHA-512 Generator
description: SHA-512 calculator generates SHA-512 checksum of text or string.
author: leplay

name: SHA-0 Generator
description: SHA-0 calculator generates SHA-0 checksum of text or string.
author: leplay

name: SHA-1 Generator
description: SHA-1 calculator generates SHA-1 checksum of text or string.
author: leplay

name: SHA-224 Generator
description: SHA-224 calculator generates SHA-224 checksum of text or string.
author: leplay

name: SHA-384 Generator
description: SHA-384 calculator generates SHA-384 checksum of text or string.
author: leplay

name: User Agent
description: Show your web browser's user agent.
author: leplay
